title: AuraFlora Business Website with High-Class Pastel Abstract Theme

requirements.text: Create a visually striking hero section with the AuraFlora brand name, a refined tagline, and a full-viewport abstract background that blends soft pastel tones (such as blush rose, lavender mist, sage green, and champagne gold). The layout should feel elevated and editorial.

quotes: build me a website of a business called AuraFlora
themed a blend of unique pastel colours making the website seem high classed and abstract

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans the full viewport height
AuraFlora brand name is prominently displayed with elegant typography
Background blends at least 3 distinct pastel colours in an abstract gradient or artistic pattern
Section includes a short refined tagline and a call-to-action button

requirements.text: Build an 'About' section describing AuraFlora as a premium brand. The section should use asymmetric layout with pastel accent shapes or watercolour-style decorative elements, conveying exclusivity and artistry.
acceptanceCriteria: About section is visually distinct from the hero with a different pastel palette accent
Layout uses asymmetry or offset columns for an abstract, editorial feel
Decorative abstract shapes or colour blobs are present as design elements

requirements.text: Create a 'Services' or 'Offerings' section showcasing 3–4 sample luxury service cards for AuraFlora. Each card should have a pastel-tinted background unique to it, elegant hover effects, and use refined iconography or abstract illustrations.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 service/offering cards are displayed
Each card uses a distinct pastel tint from the brand palette
Cards have smooth hover transitions (e.g., subtle scale, shadow, or colour shift)
Typography is elegant and consistent across all cards

requirements.text: Add a gallery or featured showcase section with a grid or masonry layout displaying abstract pastel imagery placeholders. This section should reinforce the high-end, artistic brand identity of AuraFlora.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery section displays at least 4–6 visual placeholders or generated images in a grid or masonry layout
Each image/placeholder uses the pastel brand colour palette
Section has a clean section heading and consistent spacing

requirements.text: Build a contact or 'Get in Touch' section with a minimal, elegant form (name, email, message fields) and a submit button styled to match the AuraFlora pastel theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes name, email, and message fields
Form styling matches the overall pastel high-class aesthetic
Submit button uses a pastel accent colour with a refined hover effect
Section has appropriate heading and descriptive subtext

requirements.text: Design a sticky navigation bar with the AuraFlora logo/wordmark and smooth-scroll links to all sections. The navbar should be translucent with a frosted-glass or soft pastel blur effect to maintain the abstract, premium aesthetic.
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar sticks to the top of the viewport on scroll
Includes AuraFlora wordmark or logo on the left
Navigation links scroll smoothly to corresponding sections
Navbar uses frosted-glass or soft semi-transparent pastel background

requirements.text: Add a footer with the AuraFlora name, brief brand descriptor, social media placeholder links, and copyright text. Style it with a deep or contrasting pastel tone to complete the page.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains brand name, descriptor, and copyright notice
Includes placeholder social links styled consistently
Footer colour contrasts tastefully with the rest of the page while remaining within the pastel palette

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive global design system across the entire AuraFlora website: a curated pastel palette (blush rose, lavender, sage, champagne/gold), serif or high-fashion display fonts for headings, clean sans-serif for body, generous whitespace, and subtle abstract decorative elements (floating blobs, soft gradients, translucent overlays) to achieve a high-class, abstract visual identity.

quotes: blend of unique pastel colours making the website seem high classed and abstract

acceptanceCriteria: All sections share a consistent pastel colour palette of at least 4 tones
Headings use an elegant serif or display typeface throughout
Decorative abstract elements (blobs, gradients, overlays) appear in at least 3 sections
Whitespace usage gives the site a premium, uncluttered feel
Design feels cohesive from top to bottom

constraints: Do not use blue or purple as primary palette colours
All content must be in English
No backend data persistence is needed; this is a presentational business website
Do not edit any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Real contact form submission or email integration
